setApiUrl(newUrl)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^


    Change the FreeClimb instance the SDK interacts with.

    :newUrl: {string} The URL to the api of the FreeClimb instance to use. e.g https://freeclimb.com/apiserver
